text: this is drew Ben ski he is making a
living out of sharing his globe-trotting
adventures you are far far away in the
Philippines right hey guys my name is
Drew Pinsky over the past three years
I've been traveling around the world
non-stop
after visiting 74 countries I realized
how fulfilling it is to experience
unfamiliar places and cultures my goal
is to help you see the world to
[Music]
after graduating college I moved to
Korea to teach English for 18 months
during that time I visited 20 new Asian
countries and built a travel blog from
scratch when I left Korea I took a risk
and decided to travel the world
full-time making just enough money on my
blog to get by I volunteered in the
slums of Mumbai checked across Myanmar
hot Everland in Turkey and hitchhiked
through Armenia these were some amazing
experiences though it was always the
people I met along the way made it all
worthwhile
Travel doesn't have to be intimidating
I've learned that you just need an idea
of what to expect when you take that
initial leap travel hungry is an
inventive travel show to help you get
started
I've come together with six college
friends all filmmakers in LA and New
York we set out to inspire people to
travel the world by first introducing
them to Asian cultures and lifestyles I
spent the majority of the last three
years traveling through Asia so that was
the perfect setting to launch our series
i've been ranked the number one travel
blogger in the world by huffington post
and I've collaborated with dozens of
Travel brands companies and tourism
boards who are attracted to my large
millennial audience I have more than
300,000 social media followers between
Instagram Twitter and snapchat my story
has been featured on the front page of
newspapers magazines and I've had
interviews on television networks I love
telling stories like more Thai fights in
Bangkok finding the best dumplings in
Taipei or attending horse races in Hong
Kong we're excited to present travel
hungry and help you find your own
adventure thanks for your support
[Music]
